Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type.booltype

package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type.booltype
Bool type and its expressions. Use BoolExprs to create them.

- BoolType: the actual Boolean type

- TrueExpr: true literal - FalseExpr: false literal

- NotExpr: negation - AndExpr: and (conjunction) - OrExpr: or (disjunction) - ImplyExpr: implication - XorExpr: exclusive or (xor) - IffExpr: equivalence (if and only if)

- ExistsExpr: existential quantifier - ForallExpr: universal quantifier

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    hu.bme.mit.theta.core.type
    This package contains types (e.g., Boolean, integer) and expressions operating over them (e.g., Boolean connectives, arithmetic operations), grouped into subpackages.
